text: Rainbow Brite is a 1997-2017 Canadian French and American animated children's educational television series on Nickelodeon. It was co-produced by Canadian Studio Nelvana Limited French Animation Studio Medialab Studio LA and In Association With Nickelodeon Animation Studio and In Co-production With Canal J and TiJi and Produced In Association With TVOKids SCN Knowledge Kids and Access Category:Canadian animated television series
title: Rainbow Brite (TV series)
